description: A dish that can be prepped ahead and cooked in less than 10min and served with a fresh salad or even steamed rice.
keywords: Skewer & kebab,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Pineapple,Low sugar,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Charred Beef, Pineapple And Capsicum Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs MasterFoods Lemon Pepper Seasoning (save 1tbs for final stage of cooking)
0.5 pineapple, cut into 1cm slices but similar shape with beef pieces
2 green capsicums, cut into 4cm chunks with seeds removed

recipeInstructions.text: Thread the beef, pineapple and capsicum onto 6 skewers.
Brush or spray skewers with oil.
Sprinkle over MasterFoodsTM Lemon Pepper Seasoning.
Cook for a few minutes on each side for medium beef for the final minute of cooking sprinkle over more MasterFoodsTM Lemon Pepper Seasoning for extra flavour.
Serve with a fresh Asian salad slaw
